suggest.symfony/serializer: As of 4.5.x, the symfony/serializer component will become mandatory for converting objects such as the Metadata Statement

suggest.symfony/property-info: As of 4.5.x, the symfony/serializer component will become mandatory for converting objects such as the Metadata Statement
suggest.phpdocumentor/reflection-docblock: As of 4.5.x, the phpdocumentor/reflection-docblock component will become mandatory for converting objects such as the Metadata Statement
suggest.psr/log-implementation: Recommended to receive logs from the library
suggest.web-token/jwt-library: Mandatory for the AndroidSafetyNet Attestation Statement support
